monster.name: Dancing Item (UA)

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: equal the Dancing Item (UA)'s Constitution modifier + your Charisma modifier + five times your level in this class

trait.name: Endless Waltz
trait.text: Immediately after the item makes a slam attack, it can take the Dodge action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Immutable Form
trait.text: The item is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

action.name: Force-Empowered Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. 1d10 + your Charisma modifier force damage.

monster.description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: 2020 Subclasses Pt2 p. 2
